Package me.julb.applications.platformhealth.controllers

Class PlannedMaintenanceComponentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.julb.applications.platformhealth.controllers.PlannedMaintenanceComponentController
  • @RestController
@Validated
@RequestMapping(path="/planned-maintenances/{plannedMaintenanceId}/components",
                produces="application/json")
public class PlannedMaintenanceComponentController
extends java.lang.Object
    The rest controller to manage components of an planned maintenance.

      • create

        @PostMapping(path="/{componentId}",
             consumes="application/json")
@ResponseStatus(CREATED)
@PreAuthorize("hasPermission(#plannedMaintenanceId, \'planned-maintenance\', \'update\')")
public PlannedMaintenanceComponentDTO create​(@PathVariable @Identifier
                                             @Identifier java.lang.String plannedMaintenanceId,
                                             @PathVariable @Identifier
                                             @Identifier java.lang.String componentId)
        Links a component to a planned maintenance.
        Parameters:
        plannedMaintenanceId - the planned maintenance identifier.
        componentId - the ID of the component.
        Returns:
        the link between planned maintenance and component created.

                   java.lang.String componentId)
